CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Sensitivity label required to restrict permissions for labeling-enabled users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Users with sensitivity labels available will no longer be able to restrict permissions without a label in most cases. Entry points to the legacy Set Permissions dialog will redirect to a sensitivity labeling dialog, where users can select an appropriate label to restrict permissions. UX allowing users to remove encryption or permission information without changing the sensitivity label will also be removed. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Sensitivity label required to restrict permissions for labeling-enabled users
OldVersion.description: ,Users with sensitivity labels available will no longer be able to restrict permissions without a label in most cases. Entry points to the legacy Set Permissions dialog will redirect to a sensitivity labeling dialog, where users can select an appropriate label to restrict permissions. UX allowing users to remove encryption or permission information without changing the sensitivity label will also be removed. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
OldVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, we are adding several enhancements to DLP capabilities for macOS endpoints including the ability to create groups of USB, Printer, and Network share and apply different restrictions to different groups; support for most restrictive actions against multiple rule matches; and support for Network share exclusion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
OldVersion.description: With this update, we are adding several enhancements to DLP capabilities for macOS endpoints including the ability to create groups of USB, Printer, and Network share and apply different restrictions to different groups; support for most restrictive actions against multiple rule matches; and support for Network share exclusion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
CurrentVersion.description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engage’s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
OldVersion.description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engage’s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery Premium-Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery Premium-Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
OldVersion.description: ,Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Controls for enterprise secure AI
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins the controls to manage settings for Enterprise AI features, including Copilot in Edge.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Controls for enterprise secure AI
OldVersion.description:
,
The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins the controls to manage settings for Enterprise AI features, including Copilot in Edge.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
OldVersion.description: Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release will extend OCR support in Exchange online from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, PDF) to images embedded inside following files: 1. Office: Images embedded inside XLSX, DOCX, PPTX files. 2. PDF: Image-only PDF files are already supported. This release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text. 3. Container files such as ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZ and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: ,This release will extend OCR support in Exchange online from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, PDF) to images embedded inside following files: 1. Office: Images embedded inside XLSX, DOCX, PPTX files. 2. PDF: Image-only PDF files are already supported. This release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text. 3. Container files such as ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZ and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting invite improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting invite is the first thing that the user invited to the meeting sees before joining. We are making some design improvements to make sure we have the most important information there and it's better grouped.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting invite improvements
OldVersion.description: Meeting invite is the first thing that the user invited to the meeting sees before joining. We are making some design improvements to make sure we have the most important information there and it's better grouped.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams
CurrentVersion.description: New VDI solution for Teams is a redesigned version of the existing VDI solution, providing enhanced performance, reliability, and security. It offers additional features such as advanced meeting capabilities and a simpler app update experience for users. This Roadmap entry applies to Windows endpoints connecting to Azure Virtual Desktops, Windows 365 and Citrix VDI environments only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams
OldVersion.description: New VDI solution for Teams is a redesigned version of the existing VDI solution, providing enhanced performance, reliability, and security. It offers additional features such as advanced meeting capabilities and a simpler app update experience for users. This Roadmap entry applies to Windows endpoints connecting to Azure Virtual Desktops, Windows 365 and Citrix VDI environments only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Expand investigation pane to full screen for Data Loss Preventions alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The investigation experience is now improved with a key usability feature to expand the investigation pane to full screen while reviewing the details of a Data Loss Prevention incident or alert in Microsoft 365 Defender.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Expand investigation pane to full screen for Data Loss Preventions alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender
OldVersion.description: The investigation experience is now improved with a key usability feature to expand the investigation pane to full screen while reviewing the details of a Data Loss Prevention incident or alert in Microsoft 365 Defender.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Improved FRE for new Goals users
CurrentVersion.description: New users to Goals will have an easier onboarding with low confusion on their first sign-in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Updated Home page
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, users can configure their personal booking page from the Bookings home page itself.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – leader's dashboard in leadership corner
CurrentVersion.description: Identified leaders in Viva Engage will now have access to a leader's dashboard in leadership corner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – pin post to leadership corner
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to pin one post that will show at the top of everyone's leadership corner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Restrict unintentional sharing to unallowed cloud apps and services (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to restrict unintentional sharing of sensitive items to unallowed cloud apps and services in macOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.
